articles.content:
Doting dad and funnyman John Bishop regularly talks about how proud he is of his sons. But being a dad of three lads is tough at the best of times.
However, life has got even tougher for the comedia… [+1540 chars]

articles.title: The decade-long journey to bring ‘Don’t Hug Me I’m Scared’ to television - Rolling Stone UK
articles.description: The creators of ‘Don’t Hug Me I’m Scared’ on bringing the new series of their cult psychedelic comedy horror puppet show to Channel 4.
articles.content: If you’ve never seen the YouTube series Don’t Hug Me I’m Scared before, it’s best described as watching CBeebies while in the midst of a fever dream. A demented take on Sesame Street, the show melds … [+9030 chars]

articles.title: David Beckham divides 'cynical' fans over queueing to see Queen amid his knighthood hopes - Express
articles.description: David Beckham queued for almost 13 hours with fellow mourners to see the Queen's coffin following her death earlier this month.
